item.title: Mai High Alch
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

public void gfxhalfway(int id, int Y, int X) { outStream.createFrame(85); outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); outStream.createFrame(4); outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7) outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id outStream.writeByte(100);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it's written in pixels 100 pixels higher outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic }

[quote=“weaving8, post:10, topic:151482”]Heres a code

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(712); playerGfx(113, 0); newAnimDelay = 6; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; pause[/quote]

ROFL? pause? LMFAO

Read full topic

item.title: Mai High Alch
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

public void bodygfx(int id, int Y, int X) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(X, Y) <= 60) { person.gfxhalfway(id, Y, X); } } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Mai High Alch
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Jussel, post:6, topic:151482”]Well… Why we should post others, if u’ve got already 2 HighAlch scripts?
Try them first mate… [/quote]

Its the method i want, thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2007, 11:57:15 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Aff, post:4, topic:151482”]public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) { mask100var1 = id; mask100var2 = delay; mask100update = true; updateRequired = true; }

That’s mine rofl

EDIT:

And this is my high alch if you want it…

if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch with staffs and Fire runes (Credits - Soulscape Makers) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)==false) && (!HasFireStaff())) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true) || (HasFireStaff()) && (playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==true) ){ if(castOnItem == 995) { sendMessage("You cant cast high alchemy on gold."); } else { if(castOnItem == 1) { if (HasFireStaff()) { addItem(561, 1); } else if (!HasFireStaff()) { addItem(561, 1); addItem(554, 5);//This is because it still eat the runes (quick fix..) } sendMessage("You cant convert this item."); } else { startAnimation(713); bodygfx(113, absY, absX); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[6]), 6); alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sidebarChangeTimer = 2; sidebarChange = 4; sidebarChanging = true; } if (HasFireStaff()) { deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 1);//Remove nature rune } else if (!HasFireStaff()) { deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 1);//Remove nature rune deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 5); //Remove fire rune } } } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 54) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 55 to cast this spell."); } }

DOUBLE EDIT:

You’ll need this…

public boolean HasFireStaff() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387) return true;//Staff of fire if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1393) return true;//Fire battlestaff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1401) return true;//Mystic fire staff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3053) return true;//Lava battlestaff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3054) return true;//Mystic_lava_staff return false; }[/quote]

bodygfx method please?

Read full topic

EDIT:

And this is my high alch if you want it…

if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch with staffs and Fire runes (Credits - Soulscape Makers) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)==false) && (!HasFireStaff())) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true) || (HasFireStaff()) && (playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==true) ){ if(castOnItem == 995) { sendMessage("You cant cast high alchemy on gold."); } else { if(castOnItem == 1) { if (HasFireStaff()) { addItem(561, 1); } else if (!HasFireStaff()) { addItem(561, 1); addItem(554, 5);//This is because it still eat the runes (quick fix..) } sendMessage("You cant convert this item."); } else { startAnimation(713); bodygfx(113, absY, absX); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[6]), 6); alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sidebarChangeTimer = 2; sidebarChange = 4; sidebarChanging = true; } if (HasFireStaff()) { deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 1);//Remove nature rune } else if (!HasFireStaff()) { deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 1);//Remove nature rune deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 5); //Remove fire rune } } } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 54) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 55 to cast this spell."); } }

DOUBLE EDIT:

You’ll need this…

public boolean HasFireStaff() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387) return true;//Staff of fire if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1393) return true;//Fire battlestaff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1401) return true;//Mystic fire staff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3053) return true;//Lava battlestaff if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3054) return true;//Mystic_lava_staff return false; }

item.title: Mai High Alch
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Iya… Ive recently seen that my high alch is a bit glitched. Not very good you no?.. I have a handler for Magic On Item. And this is my high alch.

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3);
p.deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
p.addItem(995, alchvaluez);
p.addSkillXP((65*p.playerLevel[6]), 6);
p.setAnimation(713);
p.animation(113, p.absY, p.absX);
p.deleteItem(561,p.getItemSlot(561), 10);
}

Now the problems im having are. The gfx is at like, leg height. Knee height :)… Lol.
My other problem is, it doesn’t always do the emote i tell it to do. It only does it, when it gains a level or what ever.

Does anyone have a method thats perfect, body height, right timers, the gfx goes the way your facing. Etc… I would really apreciate it. I’ve been working on one, but i keep getting these same, the gfx doesn’t face the way your facing, always goes to south…

Plawkz

Read full topic
